mapper.select: select s.sharding_id as shardingId, s.record_id as recordId, floor(count(s.sharding_id) / 2) as 'time', round(avg(s.evaluation_score)) as evaluationScore from tj_sharding_change_record s where s.task_id = #{taskId} and s.case_id = #{caseId} group by s.record_id, s.sharding_id order by s.id
